segments.source_content:
---
title: Tribute to Endi
authors: JMarcey
tags: [endi, tribute]
---

It is with great sadness to announce that our primary external Docusaurus contributor, [Endilie Yacop Sucipto](https://github.com/endiliey) (Endi to those who knew him), [passed away](https://give.asia/campaign/help_endi_beat_cancer#/updates) over the weekend after an illness associated with his bout with cancer.

translations.zh-CN: 我们怀着无比沉痛的心情宣布，Docusaurus项目的主要外部贡献者[Endilie Yacop Sucipto](https://github.com/endiliey)（熟识他的人称他为Endi）在与癌症抗争期间因病[不幸离世](https://give.asia/campaign/help_endi_beat_cancer#/updates)。

segments.source_content: It is impossible to overstate Endi's impact on this project:

translations.zh-CN: Endi对这个项目的影响难以估量：

segments.source_content:
- Docusaurus' top contributor, [by far](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/graphs/contributors).
- [Lead developer](https://docusaurus.io/blog/2018/09/11/Towards-Docusaurus-2) on the nearly complete [version 2 of Docusaurus](https://docusaurus.io/blog/2019/12/30/docusaurus-2019-recap).
- Overall passionate advocate of the project on [X](https://x.com/endiliey), [Discord](https://discord.gg/docusaurus) and other social media

translations.zh-CN:
- 毫无争议的Docusaurus[首席贡献者](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/graphs/contributors)
- 近乎完成的[Docusaurus 2版本](https://docusaurus.io/blog/2019/12/30/docusaurus-2019-recap)的[核心开发者](https://docusaurus.io/blog/2018/09/11/Towards-Docusaurus-2)
- 在[X平台](https://x.com/endiliey)、[Discord](https://discord.gg/docusaurus)等社交媒体上积极推广项目的倡导者

segments.source_content: Thinking about it now, it is absolutely amazing how much Endi accomplished on Docusaurus given what he was battling with his health.

translations.zh-CN: 如今回想起来，Endi在健康状况如此艰难的情况下为Docusaurus做出的成就令人震撼。

segments.source_content: We are working on ways to honor Endi's contributions - a commemorative sticker, possibly - and we are open to ideas. Leave a comment here or [tweet](https://x.com/docusaurus) if you have a suggestion.

translations.zh-CN: 我们正在筹备纪念Endi贡献的方式——可能会制作纪念贴纸——也欢迎您的建议。如有想法，请在此留言或通过[推特](https://x.com/docusaurus)告知我们。

segments.source_content: The Docusaurus project will not be the same without Endi, and those of us who worked with him will miss him greatly. 😔

translations.zh-CN: 失去Endi的Docusaurus项目将不复从前，所有曾与他共事的人都将深深怀念他。😔

segments.source_content: ![A photo from behind Endi's back, with Endi sitting on a rock cliff, facing the vast sea. His right hand forms a V pose.](/img/endi.jpg)

translations.zh-CN: ![Endi背对镜头坐在悬崖礁石上眺望大海的照片，右手比着V字手势](/img/endi.jpg)
